sentences.sContent: So you would not break the third commandment.
sentences.sContent_eng: So you would not break the third commandment.
sentences.sCn: 那么你就不会违反第三条戒律。

sentences.sContent: A friend of mine applied this commandment in his own life, with great success.
sentences.sContent_eng: A friend of mine applied this commandment in his own life, with great success.
sentences.sCn: 我的一位朋友在自己的生活中应用了这个戒律，而且大获成功。
